column4: is there a way to view a SSL enabled page (https) with mozilla browser without having to download and recompile it with the crypto switch? i'm finding it hard to believe that i've found something this basic that doesn't "work out of the box" like so many other things that are bundled with ubuntu.
I believe you can just install mozilla-psm from universe
you rock. i new my addled brain was stumbling around needlessly. much appreciated
